#labels Featured
= Introduction =

Preferences window: <br>
[http://sites.google.com/site/bubbletranslate/options.png]


= Details =

Language:
  * *Select your language*, the selected text will be automatically translated into your language.

Toolstrip:
  * *Icon click*. Select the action to do when click the Bubble Translate Icon.
  * *Hide Icon*. Hide the Bubble Translate Icon from the Toolbar.

When *Toolstrip click Translate Text* is selected for access the Preferences window just go to chrome://extensions/.

Shortcut:
  * Select the Shortcut keys for translate without Icon click.

Theme:
  * Select Toolstrip Bubble and Font colors.

You can use the *Shortcut* way and the *Icon click* Preferences selected simultaneously.
